mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", o2.name AS "office.name", a.addr_id AS "addrLocation.id", cl.pcr_name as "addrLocation.name", a.type AS "type", a.default AS "deFault", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id=a.office_id left join sys_user su on su.id=a.create_id LEFT JOIN common_location cl ON cl.id=a.addr_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office_address( id, office_id, addr_id, type, default, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{addrLocation.id}, #{type}, #{deFault}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office_address SET office_id = #{office.id}, addr_id = #{addrLocation.id}, type = #{type}, default = #{deFault}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
